title: Lal Isuan mi sual a lawm
lyrics:
Lal Isuan mi sual a lawm,
Van kalna kawng bote leh
Tlu leh muangte hnenah chuan,
He khawngaih thu puang darh la.

Amah fakin zai fo la,
Lal Isuan mi sual a lawm;
A kohna thu hrih fiah la,
Lal Isuan mi sual a lawm.

Rawn pan la, I hahdam ang,
Ring la, a thu pawh a tha;
Mi sual ber pawh a lawm a,
Lal Isuan mi sual a lawm.

Ka rilru a inthiam ta,
A rorelna hlau lovin;
Ka rilru sual tlengtuin,
Engkimah min tilawm ta.

Lal Isuan mi sual a lawm,
Ka sual chung pawh hian min lawm;
Sual tinreng ata min tleng,
Vanram ka thleng thei tawh ang.
